960610.name: The Gameshow
960610.description: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest. Now, surviving is your only objective. Players have to be constantly looking for resources: food, weapons, ammunition, drugs, etc. This is the only way you can gain advantage over the other players. The show goes on until there is only one player surviving, and the survivor is the winner.
960610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
